00022 time_t FileModTime(const char *filename)
00023 {
00024   struct stat st;
00025   st.st_mtime = 0;
00026   stat(filename,&st);
00027   return(st.st_mtime);
00028 }
00029 
00030 void SetNonBlocking(int fd)
00031 {
00032   int flags = fcntl(fd, F_GETFL, 0);
00033   if(flags < 0) flags = 0;
00034   fcntl(fd, F_SETFL, flags|O_NONBLOCK);
00035 }
00036 
00037 //====================================================================//
00038 
00039 time_t ActiveFile::getFileModTime()
00040 {
00041   return(FileModTime(name()));
00042 }

00045 
00046 bool WatchFiles::init()
00047 {
00048   reset();
00049 
00050   inotify_fd = inotify_init();
00051   if(inotify_fd < 0) return(false);
00052   SetNonBlocking(inotify_fd);
00053 
00054   return(true);
00055 }
00056 
00057 void WatchFiles::reset()
00058 {
00059   if(Debug){
00060     printf("WatchFiles: reset (num=%d)\n",num_watches);
00061   }
00062 
00063   if(isInited()){
00064     close(inotify_fd);
00065     inotify_fd = -1;
00066   }
00067   events.clear();
00068   num_watches=0;
00069 }
00070 
00071 bool WatchFiles::addWatch(Watch &w,const char *filename)
00072 {
00073   // initialize if needed
00074   if(!isInited() && !init()) return(false);
00075 
00076   // remove existing watch if present
00077   if(w.parent) removeWatch(w);
00078 
00079   // add watch for file
00080   w.wd = inotify_add_watch(inotify_fd, filename, ModEvents);
00081   if(w.wd < 0) return(false);
00082   w.parent = this;
00083   num_watches++;
00084 
00085   if(Debug){
00086     printf("WatchFiles: watching \"%s\" (wd=%d)\n",
00087            filename,w.wd);
00088   }
00089 
00090   return(true);
00091 }
00092 
00093 bool WatchFiles::removeWatch(Watch &w)
00094 {
00095   if(w.parent != this) return(false);
00096 
00097   if(Debug){
00098     printf("WatchFiles: removing wd=%d\n",w.wd);
00099   }
00100 
00101   int ret = inotify_rm_watch(inotify_fd, w.wd);
00102   w.parent = NULL;
00103   w.wd = -1;
00104   if(ret == 0) num_watches--;
00105 
00106   return(ret == 0);
00107 }
00108 
00109 uint32_t WatchFiles::calcEventMask(Watch &w)
00110 {
00111   uint32_t mask = 0;
00112   for(unsigned i=0; i<events.size(); i++){
00113     if(events[i].wd == w.wd) mask |= events[i].mask;
00114   }
00115   return(mask);
00116 }
00117 
00118 int WatchFiles::getEvents()
00119 {
00120   static const int BufSize = 512;
00121   char buf[BufSize];
00122 
00123   while(true){
00124     // get a buffer of events
00125     int nr = read(inotify_fd,buf,BufSize);
00126     if(Debug){
00127       printf("Read inotify: %d\n",nr);
00128     }
00129     if(nr < (int)sizeof(inotify_event)) break;
00130     
00131     // add them to our interal event queue
00132     int i=0;
00133     while(i < nr){
00134       const inotify_event &e = *(inotify_event*)(buf+i);
00135       events.push_back(e);
00136       i += sizeof(inotify_event) + e.len;
00137 
00138       if(Debug){
00139         printf("WatchFiles: wd=%d ev=0x%X",e.mask,e.wd);
00140         if(e.len) printf(" len=%d name=\"%s\"",e.len,e.name);
00141         printf("\n");
00142       }
00143     }
00144   }
00145 
00146   return(events.size());
00147 }
